name: Inspira Health Network
description: Inspira Health Network (IHT) is a comprehensive, community-based health care system located in southern New Jersey, dedicated to providing a wide range of health services to enhance the well-being of the communities it serves. Founded in 1899, Inspira has grown to become a leader in health care delivery, combining advanced technology with compassionate care. The network includes multiple hospitals, outpatient facilities, and urgent care centers, offering services such as emergency care, surgical procedures, maternity care, and behavioral health services. Inspira is committed to innovation in patient care and has implemented various programs aimed at improving health outcomes through preventive care and education. The organization places a strong emphasis on patient experience, utilizing patient feedback to continually enhance its services. In addition to clinical services, Inspira Health Network is also involved in numerous community outreach initiatives, aiming to promote health education and wellness among residents. With a mission to provide high-quality health care while ensuring accessibility for all, Inspira is a vital part of the local health care landscape.

seo.meta_title: Inspira Health Network | Comprehensive Healthcare Services in New Jersey
seo.meta_description: Explore Inspira Health Network, a leading healthcare provider in southern New Jersey, dedicated to delivering high-quality health services and community wellness.

faq.question: What services does Inspira Health Network provide?
faq.answer: Inspira Health Network provides a range of services including emergency care, surgical services, maternity care, and behavioral health.

faq.question: Where is Inspira Health Network located?
faq.answer: Inspira Health Network is headquartered in Mullica Hill, New Jersey, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Inspira Health Network?
faq.answer: Amy Mansue is the CEO of Inspira Health Network.

faq.question: What is the mission of Inspira Health Network?
faq.answer: Inspira Health Network's mission is to provide high-quality, accessible healthcare to enhance the health and well-being of the community.

faq.question: When was Inspira Health Network founded?
faq.answer: Inspira Health Network was founded in 1899.
